Most of the time I don't really get what professor said, sometimes when I lost one point I think I couldn't catch up with the class. Moreover, when I ask professor about some question, professor said that he doesn't know, and I can search

The robotics part of the course was important, but not very engaging. We covered some very important subjects in AI very quickly like the DNN, RNN and CNN models. I still don't know where do Neural Networks fit in the AI world. Thanks!!!

great course for learning the numerous information behind AI and machine learning
